channel.title: Help with everything
channel.description:
I want to know how to learn more about java and coding so i can make my own server. (preferably rsc server) I have no experience with coding or java at all but ive took intrest in it and i was wondering where i could start. For all you master coders...where did you guys start? :confused: Any help would be appreciated.
Thanks a bunch. :D

item.title: Help with everything
item.dc:creator: @h44ckzor_pwnage h44ckzor pwnage
item.description:
@h44ckzor_pwnage wrote:

Daviddude36, This is sought of MoparScape related but he wants to know a programing language. My recommendation would be using Google or www.sun.com and look at the tutorials.

Read full topic
